ygData.subject: RE: Super Firework?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya Fwk1 + Fwk2 + Fwk3 + Fwk4 as above + metal twine and worn great staff KABOOM!!!!!!!!! ... From: jbuckingham@tacit.co.nz [mailto:jbuckingham@tacit.co.nz]
ygData.messageBody:
Ya Fwk1 + Fwk2 + Fwk3 + Fwk4
as above + metal twine and worn great staff

KABOOM!!!!!!!!!

-----Original Message-----
From: jbuckingham@... [mailto:jbuckingham@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 2:23 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Super Firework?


From: jbuckingham@...




Has anyone tried making a super firework out of the 4 smaller fireworks?
Theres nothing in game to indicate that there is one, but I''ve tried a few
combinations nonetheless...

Fwk1 + Fwk2 + Fwk3 + Fwk4
as above + metal twine.

Just interested to see if anyone else has tried anything :)
